Source.Name: gegl
Source.Summary: GEGL (Generic Graphics Library) is a graph based image processing framework.
Source.Description: GEGL provides infrastructure to do demand based cached non destructive image editing on larger than RAM buffers. Through babl it provides support for a wide range of color models and pixel storage formats for input and output.
